titleStmt.title: Soled comfort for sound Christians, or, A treatise of Gods absolute (and most certaine) performance of his conditionall promises in regard of the elect being a parcell of a larger discourse on John 13.17 / by Robert Jenison.
titleStmt.author: Jenison, Robert, 1584?-1652.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
